public class Line
extends Geometry
implements Drawable

This class allows the end-user to draw and manipulate an oval

gmatheron

Constructor Detail

Line

public Line(double x,
            double y,
            double w,
            double h)
Creates and draws a non-filled oval

Parameters:
x - The X position of the topleft corner of the rectangle that fits the oval
y - The Y position of the topleft corner of the rectangle that fits the oval
w - The width of the topleft corner of the rectangle that fits the oval
h - The height of the topleft corner of the rectangle that fits the oval
